text: Ani anuyayi mhanu lagatila, amhala punha ekada jagata jayala milale tara kiti bare ho'ila, maga tara amhihi tyancyapasuna aseca vegale ho'u jase he amacyapasuna aheta. Asa prakare allaha tyanna tyance karma dakhavila tyancya pascattapasathi. Jahannamamadhuna bahera padane tyanna kadhica sakya honara nahi
